title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enhance SaaS applications with Quick Suite agentic capabilities (BIZ208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Quick Suite 智能体功能增强 SaaS 应用程序 (BIZ208)
abstract: Learn how Amazon Quick Suite agentic AI capabilities increase customer engagement and application value by 50%. Hear from a customer speaker who leverages ISV application integrated with conversational AI, agentic AI capabilities while maintaining multi-tenant security and performance. Explore embedding patterns, API integration strategies along with agents and actions communication for SaaS applications. Discover implementation approaches that add intelligent workplace productivity features without disrupting existing user workflows or application architectures.
abstract_cn: 了解Amazon Quick Suite代理AI功能如何将客户参与度和应用价值提升50%。聆听客户演讲者分享如何利用集成了对话AI、代理AI功能的ISV应用，同时保持多租户安全性和性能。探索嵌入模式、API集成策略以及SaaS应用的代理和操作通信。发现在不干扰现有用户工作流程或应用架构的情况下添加智能工作场所生产力功能的实施方法。
